modName: Creating a standalone character using Racemenu 3.0
summary: Very detailed yet quick guide on creating a custom standalone character for Racemenu 3 users.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]Description[/size][/b]
Here's my 2nd tutorial on how to create a custom standalone character :)
A lot more detailed and clear guide than previous one.
Most of them are very easy but takes some works to be done. Expect to spend about 2~3 hours or even an entire day for your first standalone character.
I tried to keep this tutorial as simple yet detailed as possible.
If the video is too fast, pause or play slowly. Watch in HD.

[color=#ffd966]This tutorial was created assuming you are making a human female NPC.[/color]

[b][color=#c27ba0][size=3]Main Tutorial[/size][/color][/b]

[youtube]3I1nvXOb3T4[/youtube]


[b][color=#c27ba0][size=3]How to add fangs (Optional)[/size][/color][/b]

[youtube]61sE-NIaMxM[/youtube]



[size=4][b]Notes[/b][/size]
-For ECE users
Although the title says it's for Racemenu 3, you can also learn from this video also, it's just very early character customization part will be different.
All you need to do is know how to export head on ECE.



[b][size=4]My mods[/size][/b]
Check out my other mods! :)
